title: 01-14-20 and I'm still on 12-5-19 update. Also Google Chrome crashes, when is the update for 4XL????
content: Tried removing Google chrome and reinstalled it. Still crashes saying that it has stopped responding. Deleted all cached data still crashes. Still waiting for security patch for January. It looks as though 4XL has not been included. I would like to see proof from anyone with a 4XL. Take a screenshot and email it or post it!!!! Mine still shows as follows:
